OOC: *looks around for a snake*

Wolfblade::

She smiled as she knealed down beside him.  She took the piece of
fruit and bit into it. It was sweet. She smiled at him while he spoke
those wonderful words to her that she had so longed to hear. But now,
those words burned her audio sensors more than a lazer blast.  She
started to cry.  She dropped the apple and covered her face plates
with her hands.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He led her away, to a small grove of fruit trees.
>  
> "Well, to be honest, it feels like I can't have enough of your
company.  I don't know whether or not it was the captivity with
Unicron, or something else.  But the closer you are, the more content
I am."
>  
> He reached up and pulled down what was the ancestor to the apple, a
nice ripe piece of fruit.  He took a bite out of it, which turned out
to be sweet.  He offered her a bite, happier now than a few moments
before.
> 
>
